description:
Getting one-step closer to complete connection point customization, PNW’s Loam pedals are all the things great flat pedals should be, light, strong, grippy, and available in fun colours. The large platform leaves lots of real estate for your foot to find that sweet-spot of comfort and power transfer. And, 22 user replaceable pins keep you anchored on techie climbs and offer a confidence inspiring connection in the air.

  • Concave pin layout matched to a convex pedal body for a secure connection that still allows easy repositioning
  • Low-profile bearings tuck out of the way for all-day riding comfort
  • Sealed cartridge and roller bearing for an effortless spin and long-term reliability
  • Big 105 x 115mm platform for efficient power transfer
  • Forged and CNC’ed 6061 aluminum is light and strong
  • Room for crank boots and includes a pedal washer
name: PNW Components Loam Alloy Pedals
